text:
TIRUNELVELI

Xavier Institute of Business Administration: Guest lecture on ‘Maintaining plant and utilities in the manufacturing sector’ by R. Subramanian, Business Development Manager, Syskaled Lights Private Limited, Hosur, XIBA Conference Hall, 3.30 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, MDT Hindu College Higher Secondary School, Tirunelveli Junction, 7 p.m.

SIVASAILAM

Sankar Higher Secondary School: NSS camp, fieldwork, 8 a.m.; valediction, U. Ganesan, Headmaster, Sankar Higher Secondary School, Sankar Nagar, presides, 4 p.m.

VIZHUNTHAYAMBALAM

St. Antony’s Church: Annual festival, first day celebrations, rosary and novena, 6 p.m., flag hoisting and Holy Mass by Rev. Fr. S. Xavier Benedict, parish priest, Mayilodu, Rev. Fr. P. Augustine, procurator, Kuzhithurai RC Diocese, participates, church premises, 6.30 p.m.

INAM MANIYACHI

Lakshmi Mills Educational Institutions: 50th sports day celebrations, A. Chandrasekaran, Inspector of Police, Kovilpatti West Police Station, presides, Lakshmi Mills Higher Secondary School premises, 2.30 p.m.

KALIYAKKAVILAI

Malankara Catholic College, Mariagiri: P. Mechel Vetha Siromony, Managing Director, Marketfed and Additional Chief Secretary, Government of Kerala, inaugurates seminar on ‘Youth and Nation Building – Your Role,’ 10 a.m.

THOLAYAVATTAM

Annai Velankanni College: President Dr. S. Lazarus inaugurates national-level symposium ‘Gravitas 2k16, 10 a.m.
title: Engagements
